events.inlineCode:
let instance = gdjs._TileSetMapEditor._editor.instance
objects[0].getRendererObject().texture = gdjs._TileSetMapEditor.getResourceTexture(instance.name, instance.animation)
gdjs._TileSetMapEditor.addInstance(
    instance.name,
    instance.animation,
    objects[0].getX(),
    objects[0].getY(),
    objects[0].getLayer()
    )
